capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia's lineage is quite interesting. I've been studying the maculogy of that particular plant, and it seems to have a very specific pattern of spots on its petals. I'm pretty sure that's what makes petunias so unique.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is maculogy?
